name: Glossybounce™ High-Shine Hydrating Lip Gloss Oil
about: What it is: The slip of a lip oil and the high-shine of a sheer tinted gloss meets the hydration of a balm. This non-sticky, lip gloss-oil hybrid keeps lips as nourished as they are glossy...Formulation Type: Lip Gloss / Lip Balm & Treatment / Lip Oil..Benefits: Hydrating..Highlighted Ingredients:.- Hyaluronic Acid: Helps to attract water and retain moisture for plump, hydrated lips..- Jojoba Oil: A fatty acid that hydrates and nurtures dry, chapped lips..- Shea Butter: Softens, smooths, and conditions lips...Ingredient Callouts: This product is cruelty-free and comes in recyclable packaging...What Else You Need to Know: Glossybounce™ is a lip gloss-oil with a plush, cushiony feel that envelops, nourishes, and hydrates for healthy, juicy, full lips. Available in nine, your-lips-but-better, sheer and shimmer shades that boost your natural lip color and give a glossy payoff. Get a Glossybounce™ for every bag...Clean & Planet AwareOur ambitious curation of beauty made without controversial ingredients from brands dedicated to making meaningful environmental commitments, including sustainable ingredients and sourcing, packaging, corporate commitments, and consumer transparency.
ingredients: -Hyaluronic Acid: Attracts water and retains moisture for visibly plump, hydrated lips. .-Jojoba Oil: A fatty acid that hydrates and nourishes dry, chapped lips. .-Shea Butter: Softens, smooths, and conditions lips. ..Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Oleic/Linoleic/Linolenic Polyglycerides, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax / Copernicia Cerifera Cera / Cire De Carnauba, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Polyhydroxystearic Acid, Silica, Mica, Stevia Rebaudiana Leaf/Stem Extract, Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Sodium Hyaluronate, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Aqua / Water / Eau, Caprylyl Glycol, Sorbitan Oleate.  [+/- May Contain/Peut Contenir: Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Iron Oxides (Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499), Red 7 (Ci 15850), Yellow 6 Lake (Ci 15985)].
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-For more pigment and shine, dab (instead of swipe) doe foot Glossybounce onto lips..-Glossybounce’s nurturing formula stacks seamlessly on top of lipstick. To do so, dab several dots onto the center of the lips and press together to distribute the product..-Reapply as much as you’d like....Recycling Instructions:.-While Glossybounce's components are made of recyclable materials, individual components under two inches do not typically make it through the home recycling stream. To ensure your empties get recycled, recycle through Pact Collective via saiehello.com or in store at select Sephora location.

reviews.review_text: The Saie Lip Gloss has become one of my go-to products for that perfect, natural shine. What stands out most to me is the formula—it’s non-sticky, which is a game-changer! It feels so comfortable on the lips, almost like a hydrating balm with just the right amount of gloss.The sheer tint adds a beautiful, subtle wash of color that enhances my natural lip tone without feeling heavy. Plus, it’s packed with nourishing ingredients, so my lips feel soft and moisturized throughout the day.The gloss also has impressive staying power for such a lightweight formula, and I love that it’s made with clean, eco-conscious ingredients. It’s perfect for a quick pick-me-up, or as a finishing touch to any makeup look. If you’re into effortless, glowy lips with a healthy shine, the Saie Lip Gloss is a must-try!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I just tried the Saie Glowy Bounce Lip Oil Gloss in the shade Disco, and I’m loving it already!  The first thing that caught my eye was the beautiful iridescent shimmer in the tube. When I applied it, the texture was smooth and non-sticky—more like a nourishing oil than a typical gloss. The shade Disco adds a subtle, ethereal glow with just the right amount of shine, perfect for that glossy but not overly flashy look.  It feels incredibly hydrating on the lips, thanks to the oil-infused formula, and it leaves them feeling soft and comfortable throughout the day. I also noticed that it wears well, staying glossy for a few hours without needing constant reapplication.  What’s great about this gloss is its versatility. It looks stunning on its own for a natural, glowy finish, but it also pairs beautifully over lipstick to add that extra dimension. The shade Disco has quickly become a staple in my makeup routine for that effortless, glowy vibe.  If you’re on the hunt for a lip gloss that combines hydration, shine, and a hint of shimmer, Saie Glowy Bounce in Disco is definitely worth trying!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been a fan of Saie's Glossybounce™ formula for a while now, but their new Shimmers have truly taken it to the next level. What I love most about this lip formula is how it feels like a perfect hybrid between a gloss and an oil. It’s incredibly hydrating and leaves my lips with that juicy, plumped-up look without any stickiness.  The shimmer in this new formula is just stunning. It's the perfect balance of being eye-catching without feeling gritty or overpowering. You get that beautiful, reflective sparkle that adds dimension to your lips, but it’s so finely milled that it feels smooth and comfortable. This is the kind of product that not only enhances your natural lip color but also makes you feel glam in just one swipe.

reviews.review_text: Saie new glossy bounc shade remix with shimmer looks like glossy dream on lip it gives beautiful glossy look and love the formula it keep my lip hydrated.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The shade disco it’s so cute I’m obsessed with it! The shimmer the sparkle everything about this shade.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this new shade! The addition of the shimmer to the already great glossybounce is so fun. The color is super subtle and it stays on really well

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Such a beautiful, hydrating formula. I love the applicator, the way the product applies and wears - everything about this lip gloss! It’s such a beautiful color too and reminds me of fall! The shimmer isn’t super in your face either which I appreciate.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have 2 of the new Shimmers in the shades Shake and Remix as well as the clear Kiss color. I love all 3 three equally. The Shade Remix adds a nice dark pink color to the lip, where as Shake is a more natural brown color for my lips. Both adding a nice shimmer to the lips without it being too much. The Kiss color is more of a pink sheer color. All three of the lip gloss oils feel light weight and not sticky making them super comfortable to wear. A little goes a long way with this product so in my opinion they will last awhile! All 3 also pair well with their Lip Liner in the shade Wink!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Saie's new Glossybounce in the shade disco is the perfect lipgloss topper over a lip liner. It's shimmer is finely milled so it males for the most perfect kissable juicy lips. 10/10!

reviews.review_title: It's a great gloss, maybe a bit thick?
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It was so cute and pretty!! I really loved it, and this shade is great if you love more nude/natural glosses! however, if you enjoy more pigmented shades, I would definitely get the other pink-ish shade. Nevertheless, it's so pretty! However, it can be a bit thick. I wouldn't say sticky, but it's definitely a thicker gloss. Anyways, it's pretty good! 8/10!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This leaves my lips looking super glossy, but doesn't have much shimmer! When I was applying it had more of a translucent shade with a hint of nude! Not much color with this one, so if you want a shade this really subtle then this will be your go to!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: if you love the original shades you will love the new shimmer shades. I got to try disco and shake and they are subtly different and both are so beautiful. This is a very clean gloss that has no added fragrance or flavor which I appreciate. I love how this leaves my lips feeling and how long it last for a glossy. One of my favs.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am a big fan of nude and brown hues and this was a perfect one to add to my collection. Feels hydrating and looks great. It also is great because it’s a bit subdued so if you’re not looking for anything crazy this is a great way to go. Pairing it with the lip liner will make it pop even more.

reviews.review_title: Pinky Rose Shimmer - pink with an attitude
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a cute gloss oil! I love that the shimmer adds that extra oomph to your lips. I think the pink is a little too bright for me but I love pairing it with the pencils to add more depth.

reviews.review_title: Disco - my new go-to lip gloss oil
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Lip gloss isn't usually high on my list of makeup products because most formulas are too sticky/tacky. However, Glossybounce™ High-Shine Hydrating Lip Gloss Oil completely changed my mind! I cannot get over the gorgeous pink/rose shimmer of Disco - it enhances my lips in a way no other brand has. I love the smooth texture but the amount of gloss it provides is what really sold me. Add in the fact that it's ultra-hydrating, I won't use another lip gloss oil!

reviews.review_title: My new go-to lip gloss oil
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I usually shy away from lip gloss because the texture is usually sticky or tacky. However, I am in love with Glossybounce™ High-Shine Hydrating Lip Gloss Oil! I had the pleasure of trying Disco which has a delicate pink/rose shimmer to it. I cannot get over how smooth the texture it but the high level of shine is what really sold me on this. Add in the fact that it's ultra-hydrating, I won't use another lip gloss oil!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loveee this lip gloss and is now my go to lip product! It’s not sticky at all and it leaves such a pretty pink on your lips!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This new shade of lip gloss, DIsco, is SUCH a perfect light pink with just the right amount of shimmer. It's not too glittery like other shimmer lip glosses I've tried. I love how nourishing it feels on the lips - not sticky at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been obsessed with the glossy bounce lipglosses so when the shimmers came out I knew I’d love it and I wasn’t disappointed. Pair them with the lip liner and it’s the perfect combo!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The shimmer has this gorgeous, subtle sparkle that catches the light perfectly without being over-the-top. The texture is smooth and lightweight, making it super comfortable to wear. It feels hydrating on my lips, almost like a balm but with that extra pop of shimmer. It lasts for hours without feeling sticky or needing constant reapplication. Definitely a new go-to for a fun, effortless Lip Gloss Oil!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’m already obsessed with the og Dip shade… but the shimmer is perfect on this one, it’s not too glittery but adds the perfect sheen to elevate your lip combo… run its a need

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE the consistency of this Gloss! It says shimmer but it’s not like crazy glitter type of shine so that’s an extra plus for me. Especially on darker skin tones, it sits well against my skin tone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: i have always been obsessed with the glossybounce saie product so of course i am in love with this new glittery color. it is beautiful on, i recommend pairing it with the twist lip liner 😊😊😊

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: These lip gloss oils are great! I love the shiny and healthy look it gives my lips after application. It keeps my lips moist and even stays on after eating a heavy meal. On its own, it looks great, but paired with the lip liner and french, it looks good too! the only thing that makes it 4 stars is the inital application smell of the lip oil gloss itself. It has a plastic smell but tends to go away after a couple of minutes, so it's not a huge problem.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Obsessing over the Glossybounce Shimmer in Shade Disco! Super Glowy and plumping and has perfect formula! I love it and 100% recommend!!

reviews.review_title: Must add to your lippie collection
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I already loved the original glossy bounce, I have them in the shades bounce and kiss BUT DISCOOO!! omg my new go to gloss the added sparkle gives it that extra umf!! I would highly recommend this product, it truly is so hydrating and the shade range is perfect with a slight tint and sparkle!

reviews.review_title: The best lip oil you ever buy
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product for for the past few weeks It instantly became a staple item in my everyday beauty routine. It is the most perfect formula with just the right amount of pigmentation. It is so hydrating while also not being sticky and tacky feeling. I am so happy with this product!!! I would definitely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product a few weeks ago and I’ve been using it every day now! It is such an amazing formula not sticky at all and is very hydrating. The color is a beautiful mauve, not too pigmented, but pigmented enough. Is absolutely perfect. I want one every single shade now. It pairs perfectly with my lipliner 101! Definitely a staple must have!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is seriously my new favorite lip product. It is so beautiful and lasts forever. It has the perfect glossy finish. I got disco & remix and I love them both so much. They’ll forever be a staple in my beauty routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This lipgloss oil is so beautiful with the shimmers. It’s a light oil not thick. It’s a nice subtle pink shade that leaves a pretty shine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Disco is the most perfect shade for those looking for a pinky, YLBB nude. The shimmer makes it look so reflective on the lips I love it. I’ve been wearing it alone. It can be worn alone or top a lipstick for more color. I like that it lasts a decent amount of time.    Hd more color. Overall, a great gloss for a great price!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: this gloss is so pretty! the shimmer is understated and not super visible and you can’t feel it either! the color is gorgeous and I love the feel of it on my lips

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Disco appears as a strawberry milk shade on my golden brown NC45 skin tone. There's a pretty silver sparkle in it,too! This lip gloss oil is packed with Shea oil, and other oils, that feels hydrating. There's  some slip as it warms up on my lips. I like the way this looks!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Great texture and color! Shake (nude shimmer) is a great color to wear alone or even to tone down a lipstick worn underneath.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Shake leans neutral-sheer with silver micro- shimmer on my lips as a woc with a golden dark complexion. One swipe looks like hydrated, subtle gloss, and two applications is popping & sexy. This glossy feels even better as it warms up. It feels comfortable, buttery,and not sticky. My lips feel smoother. There's no added fragrance or flavoring. The gloss smells like its natural ingredients: castor oil,shea butter....period. Therefore, this gloss doesn't irritate my lips.

When Saie came out with glossybounce last year, I got all of the shades and they were and  still are some of my all-time favorite lip products. So when I found out that they’re coming out with shimmer shades, I couldn’t be more happier. The formula is lightweight and they don’t feel heavy on the lips, but they stay on really well. There is a barely noticeable flavor, but it is not strong, and it is very pleasant. These lip oils look extremely shiny on the lips and make them look plump. I got shades Disco and Remix and they are both gorgeous on the lips. They look beautiful by themselves, but you can mix and match the shades with so many different lip liners. I often wear them around the house with no lip liner, but then use one when I run errands to get that extra juicy lip effect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love it! The shine, shimmer is everything. It’s not sticky. Leaves your lips very hydrated. Disco is the the perfect pink shade.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was given the opportunity to try Mauve & Disco. They are gorgeous!! I liked Mauve more because it’s got a deeper pigment that looks so flattering. This gloss has been long lasting & makes my lips look more full.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I personally like that the Remix shade isn’t sheer. You can wear it on its own or as a lipstick topper - the shimmer is a plus. I find it to be on the thicker side so that may be bothersome for others.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for an online review, but all opinions are my own. I truly loved this lip gloss oil. The color was pigmented. It’s very moisturizing and you need to make sure your lips have no dead skin or it’ll peel off. I definitely recommend it and get it when it’s out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve always loved the glossybounce formula, it’s been one of my favorites so I was so excited to see they were coming out with shimmery ones! I got the shade shake and love it! The formula is so comfortable on the lips, it’s not sticky and has a high shine finish. My lips feel so hydrated with I use glossybounce!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this shade so gorgeous and i think it’s more beautiful to my tan skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely obsessed with Saie lip glosses!! It’s truly the perfect glossy lip without any stickiness — and the colors are just perfect

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: i got disco and remix and both are amazing! i love how they have no smell/flavor and they last so long. perfect amount of shimmer

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The new shimmer shade Disco is so fun and versatile while feeling nourishing on the lips! It never feels too sticky or heavy! The shimmer is very subtle and not too glittery or gritty!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The perfect date night lip gloss, the shimmer is visible! Disco is ideal for putting on top of a lip stain it very light color or just for simple everyday where.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve used this daily and absolutely love it!! The only thing I would love more is how long it lasts on the lips, but the shimmer alone makes it worth the purchase!
